name: Profound Ideation Inc.'s Profoundhub.GitHub.io
body:
### Welcome to Profound Ideation Inc.

> Welcome To Our Digital Marketing Agency!

> IT'S NICE TO MEET YOU

### Our Services

**Holographic SEO Solutions**

- [x] Search Engine Optimization (SEO) for Desktop Computers are just the beginning, we do much more advanced SEO.

- [x] If you want to get found on Mobile, Local & Social Search Engines. Contact us for Advance Holographic SEO & SEM Techniques & Strategies.

- [x] Employ Our Skills to Bring You Business via SEO and AdWords Backed by Analytics. Get High Quality Holographic SEO, PPC, & SMM. We provide complete Online Marketing Solutions.

[Read More:](http://holographicseo.com/)

**Mobile Responsive Marketing**

- [x] Responsive Web Design (RWD) Layouts, solutions and frameworks are key to making your website beautiful, fluid and almost magical. Providing an Optimal Viewing and interactive experience for your visitors, without constant resizing, squinting, panning, and scrolling to make out what you are trying to say, do or sell.

- [x] Does your website automatically change to fit the mobile devices? It should and you are losing money, if it doesn't. Contact us to make your websites mobile search friendly.

[Learn More:](https://profoundideation.com/mobile)

**Digital Video Campaigns**

- [x] 85% of Smart Small Business Owners has found Success with our Video Marketing Strategy. Viewability and Gross Rating Points (GRP) are metrics most Video Marketers uses to best understand the impact of Video Ads. We don't.

- [x] Let Profound Ideation Inc. give you an unfair advantage with several quick wins. Ask us about our how-to Influencer Video Campaigns & How-to Video Contests.

[Digital Video Agency Website:](http://profoundideation.com/videos/)
### About Us

Profound Ideation Inc.: Composed of two compound words, "Profound"  & "Ideation" 

By definition: “Profound” is an adjective used to describe the penetrating understanding of depth, going far beneath what is superficial, external, or obvious to the discernment of what is difficult to understand, specifically with regards to subjects of thought or knowledge; while “Ideation” encompasses the creative process of the generation, development, and communication of new ideas, where an idea is understood as an foundational element of thought, which form may be either conceptual, visual, concrete, Virtual, abstract or otherwise. 

Profound Ideation denotes the process of creating new ideas via complex idea generation, involving all stages of a typical thought cycle — from innovation, to development, to actualization and implementation. 

As such, Profound Ideation is an essential part of the Design, Research & Development process, both in Business, Technology & Beyond.

We also offer Web Design and Development | Mobile – iOS, Android, Windows | Ecommerce | SEO & SEM

Profound Ideation Inc. is a Local Ontario Mobile Web App Development, Holographic SEO & Social Media, Digital Marketing Agency

### Support or Contact
Having trouble? Check out our [main website](https://profoundideation.com/) or [contact support](https://profoundideation.com/2016/#contact) and we’ll help you sort it out.
